verses.text: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Beeri, \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*, \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, Ahaz, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w first|strong="H8462"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w thee|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w doth|strong="H3068"\w* \w commit|strong="H2181"\w* \w great|strong="H2181"\w* \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w*, departing \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H3947"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Gomer|strong="H1586"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Diblaim|strong="H1691"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w while|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w avenge|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \add the LORD \add*\w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w unto|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Lo-ruhamah|strong="H3819"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* wise \w pardon|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w upon|strong="H7355"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

Now \w when|strong="H1121"\w* she \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* \w Lo-ruhamah|strong="H3819"\w*, she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \add the LORD \add*\w said|strong="H7121"\w*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Lo-ammi|strong="H3818"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \add God\add*.

Yet the number of the children of Israel shall be as the sand of the sea, which cannot be measured nor numbered; and it shall come to pass that, in the place where it was said unto them, Ye are not my people, it shall be said unto them, \add Ye are \add*the sons of the living God.
And the children of Judah and the children of Israel shall be gathered together, and they shall appoint themselves one head, and shall go up from the land: for great shall be the day of Jezreel.
